channel.title: Data Analysis on Glyn Mottershead
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Glyn Mottershead

item.title: Are You Talking To Me?: An Analysis of Journalism Conversation on Social Media
item.description: This preliminary research aims to show how computational analysis allows us to investigate the means by which news stories are spread.

item.title: 'Can I click it? Yes you can': Football journalism, Twitter and clickbait
item.description: Does the sports media just use clickbait to generate traffic, and is this is reducing the quality of football journalism?

item.title: Are You Talking To Me?: An Analysis of Journalism Conversation on Social Media
item.description: This preliminary research aims to show how computational analysis allows us to investigate the means by which news stories are spread.

item.title: Learning and Knowledge Building with Web 2.0 Technologies: Implications for Teacher Education
item.description: This paper seeks to draw together findings from a number of research studies to discuss the implications for the development of educational practices in Higher Education towards a student experience which is rich in authenticity.
